alert.note: Alert for Coastal Lee; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 16 at 7:15AM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Lee County through 745 AM EST... At 714 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms 9 miles south of St. James City, or 16 miles south of Cape Coral, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, East Dunbar, Palmona Park, Southwest Florida Airport, Harlem Heights, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, Iona, Cypress Lake, San Carlos Park, McGregor, Pine Manor, Villas, Three Oaks, Buckingham, St. James City, Saint James City, Page Park, Punta Rassa and Fort Myers Villas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
